import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Banner.css' import { API_KEY } from '../../constants/constants' import axios from '../../axios' function Banner() { const [movie,setMovie]=useState() useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`trending/all/week?api_key=${API_KEY}&language=en-US`).then((response)=>{console.log(response.data) setMovie(response.data.results[0]) }) },[]) return (
